titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: My wife accompanied me to the Almshouses, where I conducted the accustomed annual service for the Almsfolk, & afterwards attended the meeting of Trustees.
Miss Adela Bankhead came to see me, & brought the book of prayers she is compiling for her own private use. I gave her a copy of Westcott's Family Prayers.
